column2: BRIEF-Kraton Corp Announces Results Of Cash Tender Offer For Any And All Outstanding 10.5 Pct Senior Notes Due 2023 May 21 (Reuters) - Kraton Corp: * KRATON CORPORATION ANNOUNCES RESULTS OF CASH TENDER OFFER FOR ANY AND ALL OF THE OUTSTANDING 10.500% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Kraton Corp Announces Pricing Of Private Offering Of Senior Notes May 17 (Reuters) - Kraton Corp: * KRATON CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES * KRATON CORP - UNITS PRICED EUR 290 MILLION 5.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED PRIVATE OFFERING OF NOTES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Kraton Corp Announces Private Offering Of Senior Notes And Additional Term Loan Borrowings May 14 (Reuters) - Kraton Corp: * ORATION ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES AND ADDITIONAL TERM LOAN BORROWINGS AS PART OF A REFINANCING OF CERTAIN OUTSTANDING INDEBTEDNESS * UNITS INTEND TO OFFER EUR 290.0 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 * ALSO ANNOUNCED ITS INTENTION FOR KRATON LLC TO BORROW AN ADDITIONAL $90.0 MILLION IN INCREMENTAL U.S. DOLLAR DENOMINATED TERM LOANS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Kraton Corp Reports Qtrly EPS Of $0.68 April 25 (Reuters) - Kraton Corp: * KRATON CORP - QTRLY REVENUE $502.4 MILLION VERSUS $458.1 MILLION * KRATON CORP - CONTINUE TO EXPECT FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE APPROXIMATELY $400 MILLION * KRATON CORP - EXPECT TO REDUCE 2018 CONSOLIDATED NET DEBT BY $125 - $150 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
